text:
:wave: Hello all,

New to JavaScript and am having trouble finding an example to learn from. :book: 

After enrolling companies into a workflow using list membership I would like to save those companies into an `array`

That way, I can sort them descending by a numerical property. In the end, I would like to flag the top 25 companies via a custom property.

Do y'all have any examples of moving enrolled records into an array for basic SQL manipulations?

Appreciate y'all!
